isRegexp
===
> Test if a value is a regular expression.

<section class="usage">
## Usage

``` javascript
var isRegexp = require( '@stdlib/utils/is-regexp' );
```

### isRegexp( value )

Tests if a `value` is a regular expression.

``` javascript
var value = /\.+/;

var bool = isRegexp( value );
// returns true
```
</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

<section class="examples">
## Examples

``` javascript
var isRegexp = require( '@stdlib/utils/is-regexp' );

console.log( isRegexp( /\.+/ ) );
// returns true

console.log( isRegexp( '/\.+/' ) );
// returns false
```
</section>

<!-- /.examples -->
